row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 3)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 12)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 15)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 1)
col_desc: Queen has zero mini challenge wins.
Queen has at least two mini challenge wins.
Queen has one lip sync win.
